product.title: Elewar: Fused Survivors
product.description: Bullet heaven roguelite with lots of bullet hell elements. Packed with game changing unlocks, lots of upgrades and ARPG-like systems. New gameplay systems even in the endgame.
product.history: Early access on 3 Nov, 2023. Full release on 21 Aug, 2024.

features.feature: As of 20 Aug. 2024 over 95% positive reviews out of 61.
300 unlocks with corresponding rewards, over 140 upgrades, item crafting.
5 challenging realms, each one unlocking new systems and challenging your build making.
12 character classes combined with a dual class system.
20 offensive spells, all upgradable through rarity system. Later on spells can be fused together.
30+ random events which can be triggered throughout a run.
Twitch integration. Viewers may choose which events happen to you.
Over 30 different steam leaderboards integrated into the game.

quote.description:
I can't believe this game is free!! Really incredible game.
Crafting your build during a run is thoughtful, and feels great.
The meta-progression is robust and multifaceted.
Seems like there are some secrets to uncover as well! Looking forward to all of it.
quote.name: A friendly Steam reviewer

quote.description: It might be the best survivors-style game so far. Comparable to Rogue genesia.
quote.name: A friendly Steam reviewer

quote.description: Amazing Rougelite survivors bullet hell game. The graphics might not be the best, but the game is free anyway, but it definitely makes up with the interesting ways you can upgrade your character in a run. Mechanically it's one of the best ones out there.
quote.name: A friendly Steam reviewer
